QuestData.Title: A Necessary Evil
QuestData.Description: Hungarfen and Quagmirran used to jointly rule over the spore giants. With Quagmirran gone, the burden rests solely on Hungarfen's tendrils.$B$BWe have no choice but to put the giant down before he can be enslaved and turned into a weapon.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Hungarfen, then report back to Naturalist Bite.
QuestData.RewardText: You've done all of Zangarmarsh a favor this day, $n. The spore giants may be naturally aggressive, but they're still a vital part of the ecosystem.
